title: Why pwndbg interprets the input as a command but not as input to the program?
content:
I'm debugging a program which has 
anti-debug
techniques. One was to detect 
ptrace
which 
pwndbg
evaded easily but now the when the program expects an input 
pwndbg
interprets it as its own command rather to pass input to the program. Am I missing something?? Example: 
Waiting to initialize.
Started.
Enter a prompt: e
Ambiguous command "e": eb, echo, ed, edit, egrep, elfsections, emulate, en, enable, end, entry, env, environ, envp, eq...
